MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH2 postcode area of Edinburgh. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:45pm due to faulty electrical equipment on Shandwick Place and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 11:54 PM on Sunday, 01 November 2020.
